name: Why Is That
description:
Set in a futuristic post apocalyptic world, in which you found yourself in an unknown location — Trapped in a place where robots attack humans. Your goal is to survive whilst searching for the designated area arranged for humans by other survivors.

Will you be able to find out why? Or is there even an answer...

Download this game to experience and find out why.

This game is based from the last course of  "Udemy Complete C# Unity Game Developer 3D by  Gamedev.tv", with additional mechanics and changes.
Credits to the assets/sounds/animations used:
Assets Used: City Voxel Pack by PoèMe/Low Poly Props Pack by Indie_G/RPG FPS Game Assets Industrial by Dmitri Kutsenko/PBR Industrial Props by Adequate/Sci-Fi Styled Modular Pack by KARBOOSX/Sky City Lite by Red Panda/Standard Assets by Unity Technologies/Space Robot Kyle by Unity Technologies/CyberSoldier by Will Morillas/Exo Gray by Mixamo/Sci Fi Gun by MASH Virtual/Sci-Fi Gun by GRASBOCK/Sounds: Shooting Sound by  GDTitan /Hurt Sound by  Jocabundus/Door Sound by  All Sounds/Access Denied Sound by  All Sounds/Carbine Gun, Wall Texture, Sound for Unlocked door Base Code And ideas from Udemy Complete C# Unity Game Developer 3D by  Gamedev.tv/Animations used for robots and Exo Gray by Mixamo

Default Keys:(Other keys can be changed in Key binds under Settings)

Movement - W, A, S, D

Jump - Space

Run - Left Ctrl

Pause - Esc

Shoot - Left Click

Reload - R

Scroll Wheel/ # 1,2,3 - Switch gun
